titleStmt.title: The Christians heauenly treasure. By William Burton of Reading in Barkeshire
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. E[ast] for Thomas Man senior, and Ionas Man, dwelling in Pater-noster-Row, at the signe of the Talbot,
